Python HTML Output

Rich IPython output, HTML content, and Jupyter Widgets

The quarto-live extension has support for displaying several types of IPython rich output and Jupyter Widgets with interactive code blocks.

Example: IPython rich output

Example: Altair interactive visualisation

Example: Jupyter Widgets

Note

At the moment Jupyter widgets cannot be used as reactive inputs for quarto-live’s OJS integration. This is planned to be added in a future release of quarto-live.
